text: My family, you know, are all still, you know, very close. We're all still very close. Mom and Daddy are still alive. So, what more can you ask for? Your kids are healthy.
author: Reba McEntire

text: I know how to do anything, I'm a mom.
author: Roseanne Barr

text: Being a singer is all about me. About ego. Being a mom is all about being selfless - two different worlds.
author: Gwen Stefani

text: My mom used to say that Greek Easter was later because then you get stuff cheaper.
author: Amy Sedaris

text: As far as I'm concerned, there's no job more important on the planet than being a mom.
author: Mark Wahlberg
